channel.title: Something to write on John Cosio
channel.description: Recent content in Something to write on John Cosio

item.title: Website updates: February 2018
item.description: Hello! I’m here again. Adding some updates and changing some stuff around here. How are you doing? So I was thinking about some stuff. When I first created my website it was just so I can create one for myself. To be able to add to my resume. Thought it could come handy during interviews like “Hey I have experience with WordPress and stuff. Check my email I use my own domain” then I was learning a lot.

item.title: How can we consider ourselves “Experts”
item.description: I was checking out some job openings at Upwork(WHICH I NEVER GET HIRED EVEN BEFORE WHEN IT WAS ODESK) and other freelance/job post sites. There were many people looking for “Experts”. WordPress Experts, Design Experts, SEO Experts, PHP Experts, Rockstar Designers blah blah blah. Questions started to pop up one after another which I can’t even answer. Am I an expert? I’ve been customizing and building websites from some time but I can’t consider myself an expert.

item.title: Lazing around
item.description: Not feeling good. Brains not working well. Just laying on the sofa. Channel surfing until finding an interesting show. Watching some Key & Peele skits online. Playing mobile games. Browse lolcats. There are just days that things don’t seem to be productive as you’d like to. I’ll just declare this day as a national day-off and might as well write something here. I think cats can understand how I’m feeling right now.
